response.overview: "Mission Al-Awja" is a short film that portrays a heroic rescue operation carried out by the Saudi Armed Forces. Based on true events from January 7, 2018, the film follows the dramatic efforts to save two Saudi pilots who ejected from their aircraft after a technical failure in a hostile and rugged environment. Produced by the Saudi Ministry of Defense, the film showcases bravery, sacrifice, and the unwavering commitment of the military forces.
response.tagline: "A heroic rescue mission based on true events."
response.title: Mission Al-Awja
